metadata.description:
GAME STAFF

METROID PRIME Music
山本 健誌/Kenji Yamamoto (NINTENDO)
久馬 浩一/Kouichi Kyuma (NINTENDO)

METROID FUSION Music
濱野 美奈子/Minako Hamano (NINTENDO)
藤原 玲/Akira Fujiwara (NINTENDO)


CD STAFF

Producer
八木 貴弘/Takahiro "T.J!" Yagi (Scitron Digital Content Inc.)

Metroid Fusion Arrange Version Composed by
細江 慎治/Shinji Hosoe (Super Sweep)

中山 譲/Yuzuru Nakayama (Scitron Digital Content Inc.)

Recorded at
SCITRON STUDIO SOUNDSHIP

Design Producer
小田 能知/Nochi Oda (Scitron Digital Content Inc.)

Designed by
原 邦雄/Kunio Hara (TOM'S)

Promoted by
高橋 克典/Katsunori Takahashi (Scitron Digital Content Inc.)
外崎 剛/Tsuyoshi Tonosaki (Scitron Digital Content Inc.)
関 美奈子/Minako Seki (Scitron Digital Content Inc.)

Release Operated by
二田 祐樹/Uki Nita (Scitron Digital Content Inc.)

BIG THANKS to
ALL NINTENDO STAFF

Executive Producer
